title: Who Should I Buy, Miss Fortune or Katarina?
body:
Just a simple question really, who should I buy? Miss Fortune{{champion:21}}  or Katarina{{champion:55}} ? I only have enough money for one. 

MF looks like she can harass the enemy and out-trade the enemy laner, and her ult just shreds you if you are not building tank. If you aren't building tank and you stay in there for more than 5 seconds, RIP. And even if you are tank, and you stay in there for too long, RIP.

And the reason I want to get Katarina is because it's the assassin meta. If any assassin in the game gets fed, there is no question who's gonna win. I had to go against a Kat player before. "An Ally has been Slain, aarrghh! ENEMY DOUBLE KILL, UAAHHH! ENEMY TRIPLE KILL, AHHHHH! YOU HAVE BEEN SLAIN, NOOOOOOO!" _Kat only has like 40 health and Caitlyn has her ult, what does she do? Use it. And guess what happens, she dodges it. _ I wonder what Caitlyn must be thinking right now. 

And there are my reasons. Please vote in the Poll down below.

replies.body: I don't know if you could label this as an "assassin meta" the only ones really being played are {{champion:55}}{{champion:7}} {{champion:107}} . I think you should get Kat though. You will need time to practice her but it is worth it. Also, Bot lane is not exactly the most fun place to be right now

Both.

They're hot af.


Just kidding. (or am I?) If you're an ADC player, pick Katarina. If you're a mid lane player, pick MF. No, you did not read that incorrectly, and I'm not kidding. They're great "alt mains" for switching things up when you want a change of scenery. Whenever I'm taking a break from the bot lane, I main Katarina mid.
Depends, Kata is pretty tough to pull off while MF is a lot simpler. They're also really different playstyles, so...
Mf is more brain-dead, but kat is far more rewarding when learned.
